body:
neo via direct mail reported:

tried to install a couple of Magarena and cannot open the application, it says: "Magarena-1.39" is damaged and can't be opened. You should move it to the Trash

I`m running OSX Mountain Lion on an Macbook Air.
author: [melvinzh...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/108278210804167927868/)
title: mac package broken

comments.body:
By default, Mountain Lion doesn't like you downloading things from the internet. You can probably get Magarena to work by changing some system preferences.

Try following the instructions in part A1 here: http://www.minecraftforum.net/topic/649868-mac-support-101/
comments.author: [manve.he...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/107839499302741838633/)

comments.body:
removed apple signature from JavaApplicationStub now the message is: "Magarena-1.41" can't be opened because it is from an unidentified developer.

Solution is to right click on the app and select the "Open" command and then allow the app to run
comments.author: [melvinzh...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/108278210804167927868/)

comments.body: Should be control-click instead of right click
comments.author: [melvinzh...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/108278210804167927868/)

comments.body:
update front page to point users to support article showing how to solve this problem

**Status:** Fixed
comments.author: [melvinzh...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/108278210804167927868/)
